You bring [slave.GetFirstName] to your shed. As you enter, you light the nearby torch. 'Come in,' you call to [slave.GetFirstName]. [slave.GetSheHeCap] slowly makes way into the room. You feel the gleeful grin grow as you scan the instruments about you.

'Hands on the wall.' [slave.GetFirstName] trembles as [slave.GetSheHe] follows the command. You rear back and unleash the whip against [slave.GetFirstName]'s back, [slave.GetSheHe] screams in agony as [slave.GetHerHis] back is ripped open and blood spurts. You smile, 'One.'

'Hands on the wall.' [slave.GetFirstName] trembles as [slave.GetSheHe] follows the command. You take the knife and press it against [slave.GetFirstName]'s back and slide it. [slave.GetSheHeCap] wails from the cut and blood spurts, you taste metal as a bit enters your mouth. With a smile, you press the knife again.

You stir the fire with a poker then command [slave.GetFirstName], 'Sit in the chair.' [slave.GetSheHeCap] does as bid and you can hear the chair squeak from [slave.GetFirstName] trembling. When the poker is red hot, you press it into [slave.GetFirstName]'s arm. You smile at [slave.GetSheHe] screams as [slave.GetHerHis] flesh boiling and the smell of cooked flesh wafts to you.

'Come here.' You command. [slave.GetFirstName] trembles as [slave.GetSheHe] approaches the barrel of water. You pull the lid then grab [slave.GetFirstName]'s neck and shove [slave.GetHerHis] head into the barrel. [slave.GetFirstName] limbs fail about as [slave.GetSheHe] struggles for breath, once they stop, you pull [slave.GetHerHim] from the water. As [slave.GetFirstName] collects [slave.GetHerHim]self, you smile, 'Again.'

[slave.GetFirstName] begins to tremble when you command, 'On the table.' As [slave.GetSheHe] does, you slip the bindings on [slave.GetHerHis] limbs. 'Stop resisting' you bark as [slave.GetSheHe] pulls away from the last bind. Finally in place, you begin to turn the wheel. [slave.GetFirstName] screams as the bindings grow tight, then when you hear cracking you smile wide and give the wheel another turn.
